story.text: CHICAGO Jan 2 A logistics subsidiary of U.S. railroad Burlington Northern Santa Fe Corp. BNI.N said on Tuesday that it has acquired Pro-Am Transportation Services Inc., which had revenue of about $25 million in 2006. BNSF Logistics LLC said Jamestown, North Dakota-based Pro-Am has a base of industrial business that complements Burlington Northern's portfolio. It did not disclose terms of the purchase.
story.title: bnsf logistics unit acquires pro - am transportation
